meta.title: Form Timepicker
meta.description: BootstrapVue custom time picker input form control, which provides full WAI-ARIA acessibility (a11y) and supports internationalization (i18n)

props.description: Initially selected time value. Accepts a `HH:mm:ss` string. Valid value ranges from `00:00:00` to `23:59:59`
When true, shows the seconds spinbutton. If `false` the seconds spinn button will not be shown and the seconds portion of hte time will always be `0`

Tri-state prop. If `true` forces the interface to 12 hour format. If `false` forces the interface into 24 hour format. If `null` the current locale will determine the 12 or 24 hour interface (default)

Locale (or locales) for the component to use. When passing an array of locales, the order of the locales is from most preferred to least preferred. If not provided, defaults to the clients default locale
Step value for the seconds spinbutton. Should be a value evenly divided into 60
Step value for the minutes spinbutton. Should be a value evenly divided into 60
When set, visually hides the selected time header
String to show when no time is selected
Hidden sr-only string when a time is selected
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the spinbuttons `+` button
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the spinbuttons `-` button
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `Hours` spinbutton
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `Minutes` spinbutton
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `Seconds` spinbutton
Value of the `aria-label` attribute on the `AM/PM` spinbutton
Text to display in the AM/PM spinbutton when 'AM' is selected
Text to display in the AM/PM spinbutton when 'PM' is selected
When set, positions the menu on the top of the button
When set, positions the menu to the right of the button
When set, positions the menu to the left of the button
Align the right edge of the menu with the right of the button
Prevent the menu from auto flipping positions
Specify the number of pixels to shift the menu by. Negative values supported
Additional configuration to pass to Popper.js
The boundary constraint of the menu: `'scrollParent'`, `'window'`, `'viewport'`, or a reference to an `HTMLElement`
Text so show in the form control when no date is selected. Defaults to the `label-no-date-selected` prop value

args.description: A string in the format of `HH:mm:ss` (24 hour format). Used to update the v-model

events.description: `b-time` context event. Emitted when the user changes any spinbutton value via mouse or cursor control

args.description: The `b-time` context object. See the `b-time` documentaion for details

slots.name: button-content
slots.description: Content to place in the timepicker's icon button

scope.description: `true` if the timepicker icon button has focus
The value of the `state` prop. `true` (valid), `false` (invalid), or `null`
The visibility state of the popup. `true` if the popup is visible and `false` if not
